hero.title: Discover. Connect. Create

features.sectionTitle: What can you do on TuneBridge?

cards.title: Find Musicians & Bands
cards.description: Search and filter by location, musical roles, or instruments. Discover solo artists and complete groups.

cards.title: Post & Share Your Ideas
cards.description: Create posts with images, hashtags and updates. Join the conversation and express your musical journey.

cards.title: One-on-One & Group Chat
cards.description: Start private chats or group conversations with bandmates and collaborators in real time.

cards.title: Showcase Your Music
cards.description: Upload your YouTube, Spotify, or SoundCloud links. Feature two highlights on your profile and organize the rest in a media section.

cards.title: Post Musician Ads
cards.description: Looking for a bassist? Offering yourself as a producer? Publish musician ads to find or offer musical talent.

cards.title: Create or Join a Music Group
cards.description: Form a band or project, invite other members, assign custom musical roles, and manage your group collaboratively.

steps.title: Sign Up and Set Up Your Profile
steps.description: Create an account, complete your personal info, upload a profile picture, and choose your musical roles.

steps.title: Upload and Share Media
steps.description: Add links from platforms like YouTube, Spotify, or SoundCloud to showcase your musical content.

steps.title: Post Musician Ads
steps.description: Looking for collaborators or offering your skills? Create public ads to connect with musicians or bands.

steps.title: Chat and Connect
steps.description: Start 1-on-1 or group chats to plan projects, share ideas, or stay in touch with other musicians.

steps.title: Create or Join Music Groups
steps.description: Form a band or music project, invite members, assign roles, and manage your group together.

callToAction.title: Join the Community!
callToAction.subtitle: Sign up now and take your music to the next level.

cards.title: Solo Artists
cards.description: Showcase your music, connect with producers, and find musicians to start a new project.

cards.title: Bands
cards.description: Manage your group, organize events, chat with members, and share content as a band.

cards.title: Producers
cards.description: Discover new talent, offer your services, and collaborate on new musical projects.

cards.title: Freelance Musicians
cards.description: Promote your services, respond to musician ads, and find opportunities across the country.
